0: Be aware that laundry facilities are expensive 9 dollars to wash and dry a load and breakfast buffet is 25 per person
The room service meal was delicious but the trays were still in my room when I returned and documents I requested printed and sent to my room were not delivered
Firstly we waited about 40 mins for the meals then the wrong food was delivered and when the right food did arrive it was tasteless small serving especially for price we paid and processed
We did not dine at the facility so could not fairly rate food dining and with no n
A short walk to cafes and shops
The free wifi of 30 minutes was very poor and should of been unlimited There was no dishcloth for washing up the plates
The breakfast was not as good as other places
toilet seat old and dirty staff were rude and miserable breakfast in the resturant was very average
Had to follow up for kitchen goods forks plates etc no blankets
The truth is that I was never in the hotel bar and I was never ordering anything from the bar in my room
1: As above Great location for shopping dining sight seeing walking to Arts centre and gardens
I would love to see complimentary bottled water and Breakfast every now and then will help as well
Great conference venue with delicious selection of food and teas
The staff are very friendly and helpful that is all staff from the front desk to the waiters and Restaurant staff
The hotel is close to shops restaurants the riverside and within walking distance for cricket tennis stadiums etc
Meals in the dining room were very good and drinks in the bar were good
Bar is lovely with a great selection and bar food was really good
Definitely get the Buffet breakfast great value and so much yo choose from
Hotel was clean and loved the buffet breakfast
